channel.title: Virtio-Video - Safe builtin webcam access
channel.description:
Very exciting new feature for Libvirt/KVM. Paravirtual access to a computer's webcam and screen sharing, makes it a more secure alternative to passing-through the builtin USB device to untrusted guests. Will keep an eye on it an document it whenever it's ready.
https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=news_item&px=VirtIO-Video-2020
